meanings.definition: The territory or jurisdiction of a shah.
meanings.sent1: The shahdoms expanded across vast lands.
meanings.sent2: The shahdoms were divided into smaller regions for governance.
meanings.sent3: The neighboring kingdoms envied the shahdoms' prosperity.
meanings.sent4: Her influence in the company was like a shahdoms, commanding respect and authority.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the shahdoms' landscapes was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The rank or office of a shah.
meanings.sent1: He aspired to attain the prestigious shahdoms.
meanings.sent2: The ceremony marked his promotion to the shahdoms.
meanings.sent3: The new employee jokingly referred to his cubicle as his shahdoms.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, she held the shahdoms of trendsetter.
meanings.sent5: The responsibility of the shahdoms weighed heavily on his shoulders.

meanings.definition: The period of time during which a shah rules.
meanings.sent1: During the shahdoms, the kingdom prospered.
meanings.sent2: The shahdoms of peace were remembered fondly by the people.
meanings.sent3: The shahdoms seemed to pass by in the blink of an eye.
meanings.sent4: His reign was a shahdoms of progress and development.
meanings.sent5: The shahdoms of his rule were marked by stability and growth.
